ygData.subject: Operation GardenParty
ygData.msgSnippet: Belthassan is at sea, holding Gesper. The Hellgate is right above them but they need help fast to get out of the water. Melchana looks around, trying to find

Belthassan is at sea, holding Gesper. The Hellgate is right above them 
but they need help fast to get out of the water.

Melchana looks around, trying to find some kind of vine. She sees the 
crane, but it is not long enough to get them.

Melchana: AAAAAARGHH! Stupid technological ship! You can't find a vine 
when you need one!

Jetstorm is panicked. He was not prepared for this.

Jetstorm: Melchana! Why don't you do something?

Melchana: And why are you not doing anything, Nutbrain?

Daemos: Jetstorm, for the Matrix's sake! You're a hawk! Fly down there 
and pick them up!

Jetstorm: Y... Yeah... That's right... I can fly...

He transforms to hawk mode and flies down.

Jetstorm: Bel! Hold on to my talons!

Belthassan: Finally! (He spits some water out) It was time one of you 
acted!

The waves were strong and violent. Belthassan had to use great stamina 
to keep his head out. He made a sweep with his hand to grab the talon, 
but missed it widely. Still holding his brother, he moved his legs and 
swam nearer. The second pass succeeded, and Jetstorm used his large 
wings to get back and into the ship.

As soon as they were inside, Daemos closed the doors.

Melchana: Anachronox, help me get them to regenerative units! It won't 
get them to full health, but it will at least get them back in some 
sort of shape!
